issue.title: [CI] autotune cmake is broken
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13452](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13452). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When installing components it's pointing to `dev/archery/requirements.txt` and `un-cmake-format.py` which no longer exist.
